Call of the Blood

Call of the Blood is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Call of the Blood can be acquired during Act TBA. This quest are part of the Personal Quests that you can get in the game. Completing Quests allows players to learn more about the world and characters in Baldur's Gate 3, as well as earn more loot and experience to become more powerful.

Call of the Blood Objectives

Face your hunger.

I'm... alive? Well - I
